text: Sonotoki shito wa,-go kara yobimodoshita nodaga, anata gata wa (nigemichi o) kake nobori, hoka o kaeriminakatta. Sore de kare wa kunan ni tsugu kunan de, anata gata ni mukuwa reru. Kore wa anata gata ga ushinatta mono ni tsuite kanashimazu, mata sōgū shita koto o kanashimanai yō ni (to iu hairyo kara nasa reta koto). Arrā wa anata gata no okonau koto o shiri tsukusa reru
